texts.description: activist.org is a platform that enables more people to safely engage in activism by making it easy to discover organizations and events, as well as coordinate and collaborate on political action. We want to enable activists to learn proven and novel strategies from each other for social and ecological change. Free, open-source, privacy-focused and governed by our community.
texts.get_involved: Please see our working groups below to explore how you can get involved in activist!

faqs.question: What does the activist 'a' mean?
faqs.answer: The 'a' contains a stylized arrow on the inside of it that points down and to the left. This is because the goal of activist is to break down power structures by supporting left social movements.

faqs.question: Where do I look for onboarding documentation?
faqs.answer: Check the 'CONTRIBUTING.md' file in the project root. The maintainers have included and linked everything you need to contribute in this document. Contact the team on Matrix if you have further questions! You can find the link to the Development room on Matrix in the About page of this organization in the Connect card.
